item.title: Vitalik: Excited about an open-source AI model with contextual weighting and real-time editing capabilities, looking forward to brain-machine interface collaborations.
item.description: August 11th, Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin shared in a post, saying, "At present, many artificial intelligence developments are aiming to make systems as 'autonomous' as they can be. However, in reality, creating more channels for human participation not only leads to better results (and this is likely to remain the case for a long time in the future), but is also more beneficial for security.""Today, I am much more inclined towards AI models that are open-source weighted and have good 'editing' capabilities rather than models that are simply created from scratch.""In the medium term, I hope for a certain kind of advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technology that can provide me with real-time feedback while generating content and detect my sentiments towards each part, and then make adjustments based on the feedback."

item.title: Publicly traded company Sequans increases its Bitcoin holdings by acquiring 13 more BTC, bringing its total holdings to 3,171 BTC
item.description: On August 11, the U.S.-listed company Sequans (SQNS) announced today that it has acquired 13 bitcoins with an average price of approximately $117,000. As of August 8, 2025, the company holds a total of 3,171 bitcoins. The cumulative net investment is approximately $370 million, and the average purchase price is $116,700.

item.title: An Ethereum ICO address has deposited 2,000 ETH into a CEX and still holds 58,000 ETH.
item.description: On August 11th, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, an Ethereum ICO participant transferred 2,000 ETH to Kraken, with an approximate value of $8.55 million.This whale had acquired 100,000 ETH during the ICO at a price of $31,100. Currently, the whale holds 58,000 ETH distributed across multiple wallets, which is worth around $2.4786 billion.Deposit Address: 0x815C53bF36a3BC8B066715Da459B365e6ce6c3eDICO Address: 0x2c06Dd922b61514aAFEDd84488c0c28e6dCF0E99

item.title: A Whale Trader Profited Nearly $500,000 from SPARK Trade, While Also Increasing Their AVA Holdings by 2.79 Million Coins
item.description: On August 11th, as monitored by lookonchain, the whale "8dduty" recently achieved a profit of $489,700 on SPARK, with a growth rate of 906.7%. In the past 16 hours, they have purchased 2.79 million AVA tokens, which are approximately worth $118,000.This whale also holds 509.33 million PUMP tokens, with a value of about $1.83 million.

item.title: Citigroup: Raises Year-End Target for S&P 500 Index, Expects Tax Cut Measures to Offset Tariff Headwinds
item.description: On August 11th, the strategist of Citigroup raised the target for the S&P 500 index and claimed that tax cuts should offset the negative influence of tariffs on U.S. companies. The team led by Scott Chronert increased the year-end target for the index from 6300 points to 6600 points, suggesting a roughly 3% growth compared to the close of last Friday.This quarter's earnings reports were stronger than expected, with little indication of the impact of tariffs on performance, which has driven the stock market to new highs this month. Institutional data shows that more than 81% of S&P 500 index component companies have exceeded expectations, which is the highest level in seven quarters. The Citigroup team stated that companies not only performed well but also mostly maintained their expectations for the second half of the year.Therefore, market consensus earnings per share expectations are being elevated. They have raised the earnings per share forecast for S&P 500 index component comp

item.title: Two Ivy League Universities Hold Bitcoin Worth Nearly $130 Million
item.description: On August 11th, as per a 13F filing made public by the U.S. SEC, two out of the eight Ivy League schools, namely Harvard University and Brown University, have taken positions in Bitcoin assets. Specifically:Harvard University holds $116.6 million worth of the Valkyrie Bitcoin ETF (IBIT), and it ranks fifth on its asset list.Brown University holds $13 million worth of the Valkyrie Bitcoin ETF (IBIT), and it ranks third on its asset list.

item.title: Whale "8dduty," who recently profited $489.7K(+906.7%) on $SPARK, bought 2.79M $AVA($118K) in the past 16 hours.
item.description: Whale "8dduty," who recently profited $489.7K(+906.7%) on $SPARK, bought 2.79M $AVA($118K) in the past 16 hours. The whale also holds 509.33M $PUMP($1.83M).

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: Bitcoin and Ethereum Approach Yearly Highs, Boosting US Stock Market "BitStock" Concept Stocks in Overnight Trading
item.description: August 11th. According to BiyaPay analysts, during the after-hours trading of the US stock market on August 11th, the "Coin Stock" concept stocks witnessed a continuous surge. Multiple cryptocurrency-related concept stocks exhibited strong performance. Ethereum-related stocks: SharpLink Gaming increased by more than 15%, BitMine rose by more than 20%, BTCS went up by more than 10%, and GameSquare rose by more than 12%; BNB-related stocks: Nano Labs rose by more than 20%, and BNC rose by more than 4%; XRP-related stocks: VivoPower rose by more than 16%; DOGE-related stocks: Bit Origin rose by nearly 15%.BiyaPay analysts pointed out that this series of gains was attributed to the continuous bullish factors in the cryptocurrency market. Especially, the performance of Bitcoin and Ethereum approaching yearly highs attracted a large number of investors' attention and further boosted the prices of cryptocurrency-related stocks.In such a market environment, the BiyaPay platform offers user

item.title: Last week, the digital asset sector saw a net inflow of $572 million, with Ethereum ETP leading the market.
item.description: On August 11th, as per the latest weekly report from CoinShares, digital asset investment products witnessed inflows during the previous week, reaching a total of $572 million. Earlier this week, there were outflows of $1 billion, which might have been driven by growth concerns following the soft US employment data.However, in the latter part of the week, inflows reached $1.57 billion, possibly due to the US government's announcement permitting the use of digital assets in 401(k) retirement plans. The trading volume for digital asset ETPs decreased by 23% compared to the previous week, probably because of the subdued summer trading activity. Regionally, inflows in the US and Canada were $608 million and $16.5 million respectively, while Europe continued to experience outflows, with Germany, Sweden, and Switzerland having a total of $54.3 million in outflows.Ethereum ETP took the lead in the market, attracting $268 million in inflows and becoming the highest among all assets. This l

item.title: Last week, the Bitcoin financial company collectively increased its holdings by approximately 5,000 BTC.
item.description: On August 11th, according to NLNico, from August 4th to 10th, the Bitcoin Treasury company issued a total of 53 announcements. These announcements involved approximately 5,000 BTC. Here are the details:- 6 new Bitcoin Treasuries were added, with a total of 1,039.79 BTC.- There were 8 upcoming Treasury announcements, with a value of around $145 million.- 24 companies added holdings of 3,923 BTC.- 7 companies planned to increase their Bitcoin holdings, with amounts in the millions of dollars.- In addition, there were 8 other disclosures related to the Treasury.
